spaceWar
Class Sector

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          spaceWar.Sector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Sector
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable

Double buffered drawing canvas for displaying and storing space game state. Maintains and renders all ships in the sector based on type. Maintains and renders all obstacles and all torpedoes. Provides method for updating all torpedos. Provides accessor and mutator methods for adding and removing spacecraft and torpedoes.

Author:
bachmaer
See Also:
Serialized Form

ownShip

public OwnSpaceCraft ownShip
Reference to the users own ship. Typically used by client. Server does not have an OwnSpaceCraft

Constructor Detail

Sector

public Sector(java.net.InetSocketAddress owner)
Initializes the drawing canvas. Sets the size, frame rate, and background color. Creates event handlers and starts the animation thread and torpedo update threads.

Parameters:
owner - IP address and port number that identifies for "own ship"

Sector

public Sector()
Initializes the drawing canvas. Sets the size, frame rate, and background color. Creates event handlers and starts the animation thread and torpedo update thread. Display does not include an icon for ownship. Frame rate is set to default.

Method Detail

getObstacles

public java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> getObstacles()
Accessor method for the obstacles contained in the sector.

Returns:
list of the obstacles

getTorpedoes

public java.util.Vector<Torpedo> getTorpedoes()
Accessor method for the torpedoes contained in the sector.

Returns:
list of the obstacles

collisionCheck

public java.util.ArrayList<SpaceCraft> collisionCheck(SpaceCraft mover)
Checks for a collision between the mover spacecraft and all other ships in the sector. It returns a list of ships destroyed in a collision if one occurred. If the collision between two ships was head-on both the mover and the ship it hit are destroyed. Destroyed ships are removed from the display.

Parameters:
mover - ship to check against all other ships
Returns:
ships destroyed if a collision occurred. null otherwise.

updateTorpedoes

public java.util.ArrayList<SpaceCraft> updateTorpedoes()
Updates the positions of all the torpedoes. If a torpedo hits an obstacle, it is destroyed. If a torpedo hits a spacecraft, both the ship and the torpedo are destroyed. Destroyed ships and torpedoes are removed from the display.

Returns:
destroyed ships and torpedoes. null otherwise.

updateOrAddTorpedo

public void updateOrAddTorpedo(java.net.InetSocketAddress id,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int heading)
Adds a new torpedo to the sector display. If the torpedo is already in the display, it is updated

Parameters:
id - Socket address of the torpedo
x - torpedo x position
y - torpedo y position
heading - torpedo heading

updateOrAddTorpedo

public void updateOrAddTorpedo(Torpedo torp)
Adds a new torpedo to the sector display. If the torpedo is already in the display, it is updated

Parameters:
torp - torpedo to be added or updated

updateOrAddSpaceCraft

public void updateOrAddSpaceCraft(java.net.InetSocketAddress id,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int heading)
If the IDed SpaceCraft is already in the sector its heading and/or position are updated. If the SpaceCraft is not found in the sector, it is added.

Parameters:
id - Socket address of the spacecraft
x - spacecraft x position
y - spacecraft y position
heading - spacecraft heading

updateOrAddSpaceCraft

public void updateOrAddSpaceCraft(SpaceCraft craft)
If the input parameter SpaceCraft is already in the sector its heading and/or position are updated. If the SpaceCraft is not found in the sector, it is added.

Parameters:
craft - to be updated or added

removeSpaceCraft

public void removeSpaceCraft(java.net.InetSocketAddress id,
                             int x,
                             int y,
                             int heading)
Remove a SpaceCraft from the sector. The SpaceCraft to be removed could be either alien or ownShip.

Parameters:
id - Socket address of the spacecraft
x - spacecraft x position
y - spacecraft y position
heading - spacecraft heading

removeSpaceCraft

Remove a SpaceCraft from the sector. The SpaceCraft to be removed could be either alien or ownShip.

Parameters:
craft - SpaceCraft to be removed.

createOwnSpaceCraft

public OwnSpaceCraft createOwnSpaceCraft()
Creates a space craft for the user in a random position with a random heading.

Returns:
reference to the users space craft for updating

addObstacle

public void addObstacle(Obstacle obs)
Add a single obstacle to those in the sector. Assumes that is will only be called once per obstacle. Does not check for duplicates.

Parameters:
obs - obstacle to be added to the scene

addObstacle

public void addObstacle(int x,
                        int y)
Add a single obstacle to those in the sector. Assumes that is will only be called once per obstacle. Does not check for duplicates.

Parameters:
x - x position of the obstacle
y - y position of the obstacle

clearInfront

public boolean clearInfront()
Check to see if an obstacle is in front of ownShip.

Returns:
true if the position is clear, false otherwise

clearBehind

public boolean clearBehind()
Check to see if an obstacle is in front of ownShip.

Returns:
true if the position is clear, false otherwise

obstacleClear

public boolean obstacleClear(SpaceCraft craft,
                             boolean forward)
Check to see if an obstacle is in front of an object of the SpaceCraft class.

Parameters:
craft - SpaceCraft or sub-class to check against the obstacles
forward - true if checking for obstacles in front of craft. false if checking for obstacles behind.
Returns:
true if the position is clear, false otherwise
